title: 'State Pension top up’ scheme starts 12 October 2015 (DWP - UK Department for Work ...
text: ( Source : DWP - UK Department for Work and Pensions ) From tomorrow ( 12 October 2015 ), a new scheme is being launched helping anyone reaching State Pension age before 6 April 2016 to safeguard their long-term financial security. Men aged 65
